original_text: And it was so on the morrow, that Saul put the people in three companies; and they came into the midst of the host in the morning watch, and slew the Ammonites until the heat of the day: and it came to pass, that they which remained were scattered, so that two of them were not left together.
korean_text: 이튿날 사울이 백성을 삼 대로 나누고 새벽에 적진 한가운데로 들어가서 날이 더울 때까지 암몬 사람들을 치매 남은 자가 다 흩어져서 둘도 함께 한 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And it was so on the morrow
that Saul put the people in three companies
and they came into the midst of the host
until the heat of the day
that they which remained were scattered
so that two of them were not left together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 둘이 함께 남지 않게 되었더라
